AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hugo Benavides: United States Border Patrol Agent who testified during cross examination and agreed to statements about the stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Reymundo Reyes: Law enforcement officer who stopped the driver and issued a traffic citation
Defendant who drove the black truck, was stopped by Officer Reyes, and had his vehicle registered to somebody in Corinth, Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol Agent who made a stop on a sedan and found five or six illegal aliens in the vehicle
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Marco Montemayor: Agent involved in the case, conducted an interview with the Defendant
